A

actions - Static variable in class main.java.GameVariables
The number of actions remaining for the player to use.
addItem(Item.ItemType) - Method in class main.java.Inventory
Add one of the given ItemType to the inventory by increasing its value in the map by 1.
addScore(String, int) - Static method in class main.java.ScoreRecorder
Adds a new name and score to the scoreNames and scores lists before sorting and saving the lists to the file.
age - Variable in class main.java.Farmer
The age of the farmer.
alive() - Method in class main.java.animals.Animal
Returns whether the animal is alive.
alive() - Method in class main.java.crops.Crop
Returns whether the crop is alive.
Animal - Class in main.java.animals
Animals are purchased from the store and are held in the farm.
Animal(Animal.AnimalType, int, String, String, Item.ItemType, Item.ItemType) - Constructor for class main.java.animals.Animal
Constructs a new animal with the given values.
Animal.AnimalType - Enum in main.java.animals
AnimalType values correspond to Animal subclasses and can be used to retrieve Animal instances from the GameVariables registries.
Animal.HappinessLevel - Enum in main.java.animals
Denotes the happiness level of the animal.
Animal.HealthLevel - Enum in main.java.animals
Denotes the health level of the animal.
Animal.HungerLevel - Enum in main.java.animals
Denotes the hunger level of the animal.
animalAmount(Animal.AnimalType) - Method in class main.java.Farm
Returns the number of animals of the given type in the farm's animals list.
animalDeaths() - Static method in class main.java.GameEnvironment
Called from endDay() to check whether any animals in farm have starved to death.
animalRegistry - Static variable in class main.java.GameVariables
Hash Map that maps from an AnimalType to an Animal object.
animals - Variable in class main.java.Farm
A list of animals living on the farm.
animals - Variable in class main.java.Store
A list of animals available for purchase.
